verses.verse: Then Samuel <S%H8050><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the flask <S%H6378><s%> of oil, <S%H8081><s%> poured <S%H3332><s%> it on his head, <S%H7218><s%> kissed <S%H5401><s%> him and said, <S%H559><s%> "Has not the Lord <S%H3068><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> you a ruler <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> His inheritance <S%H5159><s%>?

"When you go <S%H1980><s%> from me today, <S%H3117><s%> then you will find <S%H4672><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H376><s%> close <S%H5973><s%> to Rachel's tomb <S%H6900><s%> in the territory <S%H1366><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> at Zelzah; <S%H6766><s%> and they will say <S%H559><s%> to you, 'The donkeys <S%H860><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you went <S%H1980><s%> to look <S%H1245><s%> for have been found. <S%H4672><s%> Now behold, <S%H2009><s%> your father has ceased <S%H1><s%> to be concerned <S%H5203><s%> about the donkeys <S%H1697><s%> and is anxious <S%H860><s%> for you, saying, <S%H1672><s%> "What <S%H559><s%> shall I do <S%H4100><s%> about my son <S%H6213><s%>? "'

"Then you will go <S%H2498><s%> on further <S%H1973><s%> from there, <S%H8033><s%> and you will come <S%H935><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the oak <S%H436><s%> of Tabor, <S%H8396><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H376><s%> going <S%H5927><s%> up to God <S%H430><s%> at Bethel <S%H1008><s%> will meet <S%H4672><s%> you, one <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> kids, <S%H1423><s%> another <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> loaves <S%H3603><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and another <S%H259><s%> carrying <S%H5375><s%> a jug <S%H9311><s%> of wine; <S%H3196><s%>
and they will greet <S%H7592><s%> <S%H7965><s%> you and give <S%H5414><s%> you two <S%H8147><s%> [loaves] of bread, <S%H3899><s%> which you will accept <S%H3947><s%> from their hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"Afterward <S%H310><s%> <S%H3651><s%> you will come <S%H935><s%> to the hill <S%H1389><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the Philistine <S%H6430><s%> garrison <S%H5333><s%> is; and it shall be as soon as you have come <S%H935><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> to the city, <S%H5892><s%> that you will meet <S%H6293><s%> a group <S%H9112><s%> of prophets <S%H5030><s%> coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the high <S%H1116><s%> place <S%H1116><s%> with harp, <S%H5035><s%> tambourine, <S%H8596><s%> flute, <S%H2485><s%> and a lyre <S%H3658><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, and they will be prophesying. <S%H5012><s%>

"Then the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H9484><s%> upon you mightily, <S%H9484><s%> and you shall prophesy <S%H5012><s%> with them and be changed <S%H2015><s%> into another <S%H312><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

"And it shall be when <S%H3588><s%> these <S%H428><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to you, do <S%H6213><s%> for yourself what <S%H834><s%> the occasion <S%H3027><s%> requires; <S%H4672><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> is with you.

"And you shall go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me to Gilgal; <S%H1537><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to you to offer <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings <S%H5930><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings. <S%H8002><s%> You shall wait <S%H3176><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> I come <S%H935><s%> to you and show <S%H3045><s%> you what <S%H834><s%> you should do. <S%H6213><s%>"

Then it happened <S%H1961><s%> when he turned <S%H6437><s%> his back <S%H7926><s%> to leave <S%H1980><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> Samuel, <S%H8050><s%> God <S%H430><s%> changed <S%H2015><s%> his heart; <S%H3820><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> those <S%H428><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> came <S%H935><s%> about on that day. <S%H3117><s%>

When they came <S%H935><s%> to the hill <S%H1389><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> a group <S%H9112><s%> of prophets <S%H5030><s%> met <S%H7122><s%> him; and the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H9484><s%> upon him mightily, <S%H9484><s%> so that he prophesied <S%H5012><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, when all <S%H3605><s%> who knew <S%H3045><s%> him previously <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H865><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that he prophesied <S%H5012><s%> now <S%H2009><s%> with the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to one <S%H376><s%> another, <S%H7453><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> has happened <S%H1961><s%> to the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%>? Is Saul <S%H7586><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> among the prophets <S%H5030><s%>?"

And a man <S%H376><s%> there <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Now, who <S%H4310><s%> is their father?" Therefore <S%H1><s%> <S%H5921><s%> it became <S%H3651><s%> a proverb: <S%H1961><s%> "Is Saul <S%H4912><s%> also <S%H7586><s%> among the prophets <S%H1571><s%>?"
When he had finished <S%H3615><s%> prophesying, <S%H5012><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> to the high <S%H1116><s%> place. <S%H1116><s%>

Now Saul's uncle <S%H1730><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him and his servant, <S%H5288><s%> "Where <S%H575><s%> did you go <S%H1980><s%>?" And he said, <S%H559><s%> "To look <S%H1245><s%> for the donkeys. <S%H860><s%> When we saw <S%H7200><s%> that they could not be found, <S%H369><s%> we went <S%H935><s%> to Samuel. <S%H8050><s%>"
And Saul's uncle <S%H1730><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me what <S%H4100><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to you."

So Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his uncle, <S%H1730><s%> "He told <S%H5046><s%> us plainly <S%H5046><s%> that the donkeys <S%H860><s%> had been found. <S%H4672><s%>" But he did not tell <S%H5046><s%> him about the matter <S%H1697><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Samuel <S%H8050><s%> had mentioned. <S%H559><s%>
Thereafter Samuel <S%H8050><s%> called <S%H6817><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together <S%H6817><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> at Mizpah; <S%H4709><s%>

and he said <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'I brought <S%H5927><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> up from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and I delivered <S%H5337><s%> you from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and from the power <S%H3027><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> that were oppressing <S%H3905><s%> you.'

"But you today <S%H3117><s%> rejected <S%H3988><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> delivers <S%H3467><s%> you from all <S%H3605><s%> your calamities <S%H9567><s%> and your distresses; <S%H6869><s%> yet you have said, <S%H559><s%> 'No, <S%H3808><s%> but set <S%H7760><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us!' Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, present <S%H3320><s%> yourselves before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by your tribes <S%H7626><s%> and by your clans. <S%H505><s%>"

Thus Samuel <S%H8050><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> and the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%> by lot.

Then he brought <S%H7126><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> by its families, <S%H4940><s%> and the Matrite <S%H4309><s%> family <S%H4940><s%> was taken. <S%H3920><s%> And Saul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%> was taken; <S%H3920><s%> but when they looked <S%H1245><s%> for him, he could not be found. <S%H4672><s%>

Therefore they inquired <S%H7592><s%> further <S%H5750><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "Has the man <S%H376><s%> come <S%H935><s%> here <S%H1988><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%>?" So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> he is hiding <S%H2244><s%> himself <S%H1931><s%> by the baggage. <S%H3627><s%>"

So they ran <S%H7323><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> him from there, <S%H8033><s%> and when he stood <S%H3320><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> he was taller <S%H1361><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> from his shoulders <S%H7926><s%> upward. <S%H4605><s%>

And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Do you see <S%H7200><s%> him whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%>? Surely <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> him among all <S%H3605><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>" So all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "[Long] live <S%H2421><s%> the king! <S%H4428><s%>"

Then Samuel <S%H8050><s%> told <S%H1696><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> the ordinances <S%H4941><s%> of the kingdom, <S%H4410><s%> and wrote <S%H3789><s%> [them] in the book <S%H5612><s%> and placed <S%H5117><s%> [it] before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> And Samuel <S%H8050><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> away, <S%H7971><s%> each <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to his house. <S%H1004><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%> at Gibeah; <S%H1390><s%> and the valiant <S%H2428><s%> [men] whose <S%H834><s%> hearts <S%H3820><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had touched <S%H5060><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> with him.

But certain worthless <S%H1100><s%> men <S%H1121><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "How <S%H4100><s%> can this <S%H2088><s%> one <S%H2088><s%> deliver <S%H3467><s%> us?" And they despised <S%H959><s%> him and did not bring <S%H935><s%> him any present. <S%H4503><s%> But he kept <S%H2790><s%> silent. <S%H2790><s%>
